issue.message: Calling `Method.invoke` without an SDK check

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "action", in androidx.test.uiautomator.UiDevice.performActionAndWait) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
issue.errorLine1: public <R> R performActionAndWait(Runnable action, EventCondition<R> condition, long timeout) {

issue.message: Unknown nullability; explicitly declare as `@Nullable` or `@NonNull` to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://developer.android.com/kotlin/interop#nullability_annotations
